mapper.select: SELECT A.CODE , A.CREATED_AT , A.AMOUNT , A.IS_REGULAR , A.TITLE , A.MEMBER_CODE , A.ACC_CATEGORY_CODE , A.STORE_CODE , A.ASSET_CODE FROM ACCBOOK A WHERE A.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') = #{ findDate };

SELECT A.CODE , A.CREATED_AT , A.AMOUNT , A.IS_REGULAR , A.TITLE , A.MEMBER_CODE , A.ACC_CATEGORY_CODE , A.STORE_CODE , A.ASSET_CODE FROM accbook A WHERE A.member_code = #{ memberCode } AND DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at, '%Y-%m') = #{ findDate } AND WEEK(A.created_at, 1) - WEEK(DATE_SUB(A.created_at, INTERVAL DAYOFMONTH(A.created_at) - 1 DAY), 1) + 1 = #{ weekNo };

SELECT A.CODE , A.CREATED_AT , A.AMOUNT , A.IS_REGULAR , A.TITLE , A.MEMBER_CODE , A.ACC_CATEGORY_CODE , A.STORE_CODE , A.ASSET_CODE FROM ACCBOOK A WHERE A.MEMBER_CODE = #{ memberCode } AND DATE_FORMAT(A.created_at, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(#{ findDate }, '%Y-%m-%d'), '%Y-%m');

SELECT A.member_code , A.MONTH_YEAR , A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.total_spent , A.spending_rank FROM ( SELECT YEAR(B.created_at) AS year , MONTH(B.created_at) AS month , CONCAT(YEAR(B.created_at), '-', MONTH(B.created_at)) AS MONTH_YEAR , C.name AS CATEGORY_NAME , B.member_code , SUM(B.amount) AS total_spent , RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY YEAR(B.created_at), MONTH(B.created_at) ORDER BY SUM(B.amount) DESC) AS spending_rank FROM accbook B JOIN acc_category C ON B.acc_category_code = C.code WHERE B.member_code = #{ memberCode } and DATE_FORMAT(B.created_at, '%Y-%m') = #{ findDate } GROUP BY YEAR(B.created_at), MONTH(B.created_at), B.acc_category_code ) AS A WHERE A.spending_rank <= 3 ORDER BY A.year, A.month, A.spending_rank;

SELECT A.CATEGORY_NAME , A.finance_type , A.total_spent FROM ( SELECT C.name AS CATEGORY_NAME , C.finance_type , SUM(B.amount) AS total_spent FROM accbook B JOIN acc_category C ON B.acc_category_code = C.code WHERE B.member_code = #{ memberCode } and DATE_FORMAT(B.created_at, '%Y-%m') = #{ findDate } GROUP BY YEAR(B.created_at), MONTH(B.created_at), B.acc_category_code ) AS A ORDER BY A.finance_type, A.total_spent DESC;
SELECT B.detail , B.created_at , B.code AS comment_code , B.parent_code , B.member_code FROM accbook A, acc_comment B WHERE A.code = B.accbook_code AND A.code = #{ accbookCode };

SELECT A.code , A.created_at , A.is_regular , A.amount , A.is_regular , A.title , B.name AS acc_category_name , C.name AS store_name , D.name AS asset_name FROM accbook A LEFT JOIN acc_category B ON A.acc_category_code = B.code LEFT JOIN store C ON A.store_code = C.code LEFT JOIN asset D ON A.asset_code = D.code WHERE A.code = #{ accbookCode };
